Replace.Text: Your technology is quite advanced, is there any secret?
I always feel your development is a bit strange, maybe you should catch up on technology.
Greetings traveler. Our creators called us the "Naar-Di-Shav" which roughly translates to "Gray Tempest" in your language. I suppose to keep things simple you could simply call me "Gray".
You've distanced yourself from us, whether due to innate factors or subsequent decisions. You're very fortunate.
(They are pleased that your country is far away from them)
If our civilizations all had more land, they would surely thrive more, right?
(Your cities are too close to theirs)
(They are pleased to see that your cities are populous)
Your population may become a big problem, growth nodes foresee a downturn.
